verses.text: Ach in Diosal, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin, a t'ayach tzin say in colnab'il. In gana tzin col in b'a t'ayach icha tz'aj scolan sb'a nok' yunetac caxlanh t'a yalanh sk'axil snun, masanto ol lajvoquek' jun yaelal tik.
Ach in Diosal te niwan elk'ochi, tzin avaj t'ayach, yujto a achnhej tzach colvajnhej ved'oc.
Ha yuj a wach'k'olal, yuj pax to tz'elk'och tas tzala', yuj chi' masanto t'a satcha’anh tzak'cot in colnab'il. Ol in a colel t'a yol sk'ab' eb' tzin ixtan chi'.
Ichato t'a skal nok' choj schi'an anima ayin eq'ui. Ha q'uen ye eb' lajan icha q'uen lanza yet' te' jul-lab'. Ha tas syal eb', lajan icha q'uen espada te jay ye.
Ach in Diosal, tzek'b'at snivanil elk'och t'a satcha’anh. Ha snivanil elk'och chi', chequel t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
Ha eb' ajk'ol yajoch t'ayin, ix yaq'uem in yaalil eb', manhxo animaoc vaj yuj eb', ix sb'oan jun olan eb' t'a yol in b'e, palta anheja' eb' ix b'at t'a yool.
Ach in Diosal, b'ecan in k'ool, in gana tzach in b'itej yet' wach' lolonel.
Yuj chi' ol vaq'uel in vayanh, ol ach in b'itej yet' te' arpa yet' salterio. Ayic van sakb'i, ol el in vayanh, ol ach in b'itani.
Mamin, ol val wach' lolonel t'ayach t'a skal juntzanh chonhab'. Ol ach in b'itej t'a skal juntzanh nación.
Nivan ton a wach'k'olal, masanto t'a satcha’anh sk'ochi. Tz'elnhejk'och tas tzala'.
Ach in Diosal, tzek'b'at snivanil elk'och t'a satcha’anh. Ha snivanil elk'och chi', chequel t'a masanil yol yib'anhk’inal tik.
